variants.text: We're offering complimentary press passes to journalists and media professionals covering the biotech and startup ecosystem. Your ticket is on us!
variants.use_case: Standard free ticket offer for journalists

variants.text: As a member of the press, you'll receive a complimentary ticket plus exclusive access to backstage areas, press briefings, and one-on-one interviews with speakers, investors, and startup founders.
variants.use_case: Premium press access with additional perks

variants.text: In exchange for a mention or article about the {{event_name}}, we'd be delighted to offer you a free press pass. Whether it's a brief social media post or a full feature article, we'd appreciate any coverage you can provide.
variants.use_case: Explicit exchange - free ticket for coverage

variants.text: We're providing complimentary press passes for journalists interested in covering European biotech innovation. No obligation to write - though we'd be thrilled if you found a story worth sharing with your audience!
variants.use_case: Low-pressure offer, coverage optional but encouraged

variants.text: We'd love to exchange a complimentary press pass for a shoutout about the event. Even a single social media post or newsletter mention would help us reach the innovators and investors who make up our community.
